title: Stencil - Le Corbus-it-ain't... - probably custom, various alternatives {Yves}
content:
Posted this last week, but no replies... Am going to give it one more shot;

This rather lovely stencil face is on an old tin container i bought... Any suggestions as to what it might be/similar fonts?

Lineto's Le Corbusier seems to be along the right lines, but am put off slightly by the price-tag!

Cheers!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141113073617im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC00011_6730.JPG)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [DSC00011.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20141113073617/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC00011_0.JPG) | 562.77 KB |
author: Aled

comments.content: You could start with the [Stencil FontList](http://web.archive.org/web/20141113073617/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/stencil/), in the [Slab Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20141113073617/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/stencil_slab_serif/) or [Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20141113073617/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/stencil_display/) subcategories.

(continued [from here](http://web.archive.org/web/20141113073617/http:/typophile.com/node/66497))

Well, this is most likely custom-made.
